getWeightedManaCost

public double getWeightedManaCost()
Returns Mana cost, adjusted slightly to make colored mana parts more significant. Should only be used for comparison purposes; using this method allows the sort: 2 < X 2 < 1 U < U U == UR U < X U U < X X U U

Returns:
The converted cost + 0.0001* the number of colored mana in the cost + 0.00001 * the number of X's in the cost
